README.rmd
------------------------------------------------------------
Class:  Getting & Cleaning Data - Coursera

Project: Formation of a Tidy data set

This project uses a database of Samsung smartphone measurements used to explore the determination of the type of activity the user is engaged in.
 Reference for this database:
 http://archive.ics.uci.edu/ml/datasets/Human+Activity+Recognition+Using+Smartphones

 Note - data files are described in the associated files:  README.txt and features_info.txt
the data files are found at:

  https://d396qusza40orc.cloudfront.net/getdata%2Fprojectfiles%2FUCI%20HAR%20Dataset.zip

  the file used to create the tidy dataset is named:  run_analysis.R
